talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Mornin'! Come back whenever you wanna
rest those weary bones.
talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Mornin'! Er, afternoon! I woke you up just
when you asked me to.

Come back whenever you wanna rest
those weary bones.
talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Mornin'! Er, evenin'! Nighttime wake up,
just as you requested.

Come back whenever you wanna rest
those weary bones.
talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Mornin'!


Good rest and good massage, eh?


You slept like a rock! I could hardly get
you to wake up this morning.

Come back any ol' time.
talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>A bed will cost ya <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>If you wanna
throw in a Goron massage, that'll run ya
<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk09: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Aw, I was hopin' you'd try the massage.
talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Afternoon!


Good rest and good massage, eh?


You slept like a rock! I could hardly get
you to wake up this afternoon.

Come back any ol' time.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sick of trying to get customers to
go inside...

It's not nearly hot enough for <clr:0000>fireproof
gear<clr:ffff>. Nobody's gonna buy it right now.
talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Evenin'!


Good rest and good massage, eh?


You slept like a rock! I could hardly get
you to wake up this evening.

Come back any ol' time.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to the clothing shop! <sp:5:1:0>Wait, wait.
No, I mean the inn!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Oh no...<sp:5:0:0> I did it again.


Y'see, I used to work at a clothing shop,
so I still get mixed up.

The previous innkeep, Tray, is retiring,
and I've taken on the business.

But if I can't even remember what kinda
shop I'm runnin', I've got a long way
to go...
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>But I'll do a good job, eventually! I made
a promise to Tray. That's why, sir...

I'd like...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>I'd like you to be my first customer!


I give a killer massage too! You won't
regret it!
talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Sir, is this your first time hearing about
Goron massages?<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>We administer the massage on a hard
rock bed,<sp:5:0:0> and we apply a lot of pressure
to loosen the muscles.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But it doesn't hurt one bit.<sp:5:0:0> Just lie back
and relax.

You'll wake up refreshed, rejuvenated,
and restored! The three magic Rs!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks for stopping by!


Now then, sir, would you like a massage?
Or would you like a bed?
talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sir... <sp:5:0:0>You can't sleep in one of our beds
if you don't have the money.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Up until a couple years ago, Death
Mountain was super active and erupting.

It's the reason Goron City was so hot and
flowing with lava.

A little Hylian like you would've been
cooked to a crisp!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So we always sold <clr:0000>fireproof gear<clr:ffff> for folks
such as yourself, but now the only places
hot enough for it are the <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>.
Our sales have hit rock bottom...
talk11: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:QuestionNormal>How long do you wanna sleep for?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Trying to get customers is such a pain.
If you want anything, though, you should
talk to Rogaro inside.
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:QuestionNormal>A bed and a massage, you got it! How
long do you wanna rest for?
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Welcome.


I ALMOST said, "Welcome to the clothing
shop," but then I didn't!

See? I'm gettin' better!


<sp:3:0:2:0800>Y'know, I learned my massagin' skills from
ol' Tray himself. Stay here and you'll feel
limber and well rested!
